name: Harmony Haven
creator: Owen
description: Dive into the world of musical bliss with Harmony Haven.

items.title: Melodic Dreams
items.description: Embark on a journey through dreamy melodies.
items.note: Close your eyes and let the music carry you.

items.title: Sonic Voyager
items.description: A sonic adventurer pushing the boundaries of sound.
items.note: Explore the unknown with Sonic Voyager.

items.title: Euphoric Beats
items.description: Feel the euphoria with this upbeat playlist.
items.note: Get ready to dance your heart out.

items.title: Celestial Harmony
items.description: A celestial journey of harmonious tunes.
items.note: Let the cosmic melodies elevate your spirit.

items.title: Mystical Grooves
items.description: Explore the mysteries of sound with this enchanting album.
items.note: Immerse yourself in the magic of Mystical Grooves.
